trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Set-Content
trans-unit.target: Set-Content

trans-unit.source: Set-Content
trans-unit.target: Set-Content

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Writes or replaces the content in an item with new content.
trans-unit.target: 以新的內容寫入或取代項目中的內容。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路徑 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: 常值路徑

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The Set-Content cmdlet is a string-processing cmdlet that writes or replaces the content in the specified item, such as a file.
trans-unit.target: Set-Content Cmdlet 是字串處理 Cmdlet，它可寫入或取代指定項目中的內容，例如某個檔案。

trans-unit.source: Whereas the Add-Content cmdlet appends content to a file, Set-Content replaces the existing content.
trans-unit.target: Add-Content Cmdlet 會將內容附加到檔案，而 Set-Content 會取代現有的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can type the content in the command or send content through the pipeline to Set-Content.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在命令中輸入內容，或透過管線將內容傳送至 Set-Content。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: This command replaces the contents of all files in the Test1 directory that have names beginning with "test" with "Hello, World".
trans-unit.target: 此命令會以 "Hello, World" 取代 Test1 目錄中所有檔案名稱開頭為 "test" 的檔案內容。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to specify content by typing it in the command.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何透過在命令中輸入內容的方式來指定內容。

trans-unit.source: This command creates a comma-separated variable-length (csv) file that contains only the current date and time.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會建立逗點分隔可變長度 (CSV) 檔，其中只包含目前的日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Get-Date cmdlet to get the current system date and time.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 Get-Date Cmdlet 取得目前的系統日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator passes the result to Set-Content, which creates the file and writes the content.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子將結果傳送至 Set-Content，它會建立檔案並寫入內容。

trans-unit.source: If the Test1 directory does not exist, the command fails, but if the file does not exist, the command will create it.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Test1 目錄不存在，命令會失敗，但如果檔案不存在，命令會建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: This command replaces all instances of "Warning" with "Caution" in the Notice.txt file.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會將 Notice.txt 檔案中所有 "Warning" 實例以 "Caution" 取代。

trans-unit.source: It uses the Get-Content cmdlet to get the content of Notice.txt.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 Get-Content Cmdlet 取得 Notice.txt 的內容。

trans-unit.source: The pipeline operator sends the results to the ForEach-Object cmdlet, which applies the expression to each line of content in Get-Content.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子將結果傳送至 ForEach-Object Cmdlet，然後將運算式套用至 Get-Content 中內容的每一行。

trans-unit.source: The expression uses the "$_" symbol to refer to the current item and the Replace parameter to specify the text to be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 該運算式使用 "$_" 符號來參照目前的項目，以及使用 Replace 參數來指定要取代的文字。

trans-unit.source: Another pipeline operator sends the changed content to Set-Content which replaces the text in Notice.txt with the new content.
trans-unit.target: 另一個管線運算子將已變更的內容傳送至 Set-Content，然後以新的內容取代 Notice.txt 中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The parentheses around the Get-Content command ensure that the Get operation is complete before the Set operation begins.
trans-unit.target: Get-Content 命令前後的括號會確保開始 Set 操作之前，已完成 Get 操作。

trans-unit.source: Without them, the command will fail because the two functions will be trying to access the same file.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有括號，命令會失敗，因為兩個函式會嘗試存取相同的檔案。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Encoding
trans-unit.target: 編碼方式

trans-unit.source: Specifies the file encoding.
trans-unit.target: 指定檔案的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is ASCII.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 ASCII。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are:
trans-unit.target: 有效值為：

trans-unit.source: -- ASCII: Uses the encoding for the ASCII (7-bit) character set.
trans-unit.target: -ASCII︰ 使用 ASCII （7 位元） 字元集的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: -- BigEndianUnicode: Encodes in UTF-16 format using the big-endian byte order.
trans-unit.target: -BigEndianUnicode︰ 使用位元組由大到小的位元組順序的 utf-16 格式編碼。

trans-unit.source: -- Byte: Encodes a set of characters into a sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: -位元組︰ 將一組字元編碼成位元組序列。

trans-unit.source: -- String: Uses the encoding type for a string.
trans-unit.target: -字串︰ 使用字串的編碼類型。

trans-unit.source: -- Unicode: Encodes in UTF-16 format using the little-endian byte order.
trans-unit.target: -Unicode︰ 使用位元組由小到大位元組順序的 utf-16 格式編碼。

trans-unit.source: -- UTF7: Encodes in UTF-7 format.
trans-unit.target: -UTF7︰ 以 utf-7 格式來編碼。

trans-unit.source: -- UTF8: Encodes in UTF-8 format.
trans-unit.target: -UTF8︰ 以 utf-8 格式編碼。

trans-unit.source: -- Unknown: The encoding type is unknown or invalid.
trans-unit.target: -未知︰ 編碼類型是未知或無效。

trans-unit.source: The data can be treated as binary.
trans-unit.target: 資料可視為二進位檔。

trans-unit.source: Encoding is a dynamic parameter that the FileSystem provider adds to the Set-Content cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 編碼是動態參數，FileSystem 提供者加入至 Set-content cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This parameter works only in file system drives.```yaml Type: FileSystemCmdletProviderEncoding Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases: Accepted values: Unknown, String, Unicode, Byte, BigEndianUnicode, UTF8, UTF7, UTF32, Ascii, Default, Oem
trans-unit.target: 此參數只適用於檔案系統磁碟機。 '' yaml 類型︰ FileSystemCmdletProviderEncoding 參數集: （全部） 的別名︰ 已接受的值︰ 不明、 字串、 Unicode、 位元組、 BigEndianUnicode、 UTF8、 UTF7、 UTF32、 Ascii、 預設、 Oem

trans-unit.source: Required: False Position: Named Default value: ASCII Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False
trans-unit.target: 必要︰ False 位置︰ 名為預設值︰ ASCII 接受管線輸入︰ False 接受萬用字元︰ False

trans-unit.source: -Stream
trans-unit.target: 資料流

trans-unit.source: Creates or replaces the content in the specified alternate data stream.
trans-unit.target: 建立或取代指定替代資料流中的內容。

trans-unit.source: If the stream does not yet exist, Set-Content creates it.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流尚未存在，Set-content 會建立它。

trans-unit.source: Enter the stream name.
trans-unit.target: 輸入資料流名稱。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: Stream is a dynamic parameter that the FileSystem provider adds to the Set-Content cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 資料流是動態參數，FileSystem 提供者加入至 Set-content cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This parameter works only in file system drives.
trans-unit.target: 此參數只適用於檔案系統磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Set-Content cmdlet to change the content of the Zone.Identifier alternate data stream.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Set-content cmdlet 來變更 Zone.Identifier 替代資料流內容。

trans-unit.source: However, it is not the recommended way to eliminate security checks that block files that are downloaded from the Internet.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不建議使用這個方法來取代封鎖從網際網路下載之檔案的安全性檢查。

trans-unit.source: If you verify that a downloaded file is safe, use the Unblock-File cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 如果您確認下載的檔案是安全的，請使用 Unblock-File Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.```yaml Type: String Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases:
trans-unit.target: 這個參數在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 引進。 '' yaml 型別︰ 字串參數集: （全部） 的別名︰

trans-unit.source: Required: False Position: Named Default value: None Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False
trans-unit.target: 必要︰ False 位置︰ 名為預設值︰ 無接受管線輸入︰ False 接受萬用字元︰ False

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 將命令加入使用中交易。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱包含使用中交易中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題中的

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定具有執行此動作權限的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 預設為目前使用者。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01", or enter a PSCredential object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入使用者名稱，例如 "User01" 或 "Domain01\User01"，或輸入 PSCredential 物件，例如 Get-Credential Cmdlet 產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 若您輸入使用者名稱，將會提示您輸入密碼。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 與 Windows PowerShell 一起安裝的任何提供者皆不支援此參數。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Omits the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 省略指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 "*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 篩選器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filter in the provider's format or language.
trans-unit.target: 以提供者的格式或語言指定篩選。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the filter, including the use of wildcards, depends on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 篩選的語法 (包括是否使用萬用字元) 取決於提供者。

trans-unit.source: Filters are more efficient than other parameters, because the provider applies them when retrieving the objects, rather than having Windows PowerShell filter the objects after they are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 篩選比其他參數更有效率，因為提供者會在抓取物件時套用篩選，而不是讓 Windows PowerShell 抓取物件後篩選。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Changes only the specified items.
trans-unit.target: 只變更指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 Path 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 "*.txt"。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the item that will receive the content.
trans-unit.target: 指定將接收內容的項目路徑。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Path, the value of LiteralPath is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 與 Path 不同，LiteralPath 將完全依照其輸入值來使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將它括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號告知 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the content.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the item that will receive the content.
trans-unit.target: 指定將接收內容的項目路徑。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new content for the item.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目的新內容。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Object
trans-unit.target: System.Object

trans-unit.source: You can pipe an object that contains the new value for the item to Set-Content.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線將包含項目新值的物件傳送至 Set-Content。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None or System.String
trans-unit.target: 無或 System.String

trans-unit.source: When you use the Passthru parameter, Set-Content generates a System.String object representing the content.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Passthru 參數時，Set-Content 會產生代表內容的 System.String 物件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to Set-Content by its built-in alias, "sc".
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用內建的別名 "sc" 來參照 Set-Content。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: Set-Content is designed for string processing.
trans-unit.target: Set-Content 是針對字串處理所設計。

trans-unit.source: If you pipe non-string objects to Set-Content, it converts the object to a string before writing it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用管線將非字串物件傳送至 Set-Content，它會在寫入該物件之前將它轉換成字串。

trans-unit.source: To write objects to files, use Out-File.
trans-unit.target: 若要將物件寫入檔案，請使用 Out-File。

trans-unit.source: The Set-Content cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: Set-Content Cmdlet 是針對與任何提供者公開的資料搭配使用所設計。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type "Get-PsProvider".
trans-unit.target: 若要列出工作階段中可用的提供者，請輸入 "Get-PsProvider"。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: Add-Content

trans-unit.target: Clear-Content

trans-unit.target: Get-Content
